# zorgmijding_CVD

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of zorgmijding_CVD is to analyse data from five GP registration databases in the Netherlands and assess healthcare utilisation for cardiovascular complaints  in primary care during the first year of the COVID-19 pandemic.
